transcript.content: Hi, this is Sarah. I'm following up on your interest in selling your property. Is now a good time?
Sure, I have a few minutes.
Great! What can you tell me about your property and timeline?
It's a 4-bedroom in Scottsdale. I'm thinking about selling in the next 6 months or so, but I'm not in a huge rush.
Understood. Have you thought about your target price range?
Not really sure yet. I know the market is decent right now. Maybe somewhere in the $500K range? I'd need to talk to my wife before making any decisions.
That makes sense. Would it be helpful if I sent you a comp analysis for your area so you have more information?
Yeah, that would be useful. I'd like to see what similar homes are selling for.

call_analysis.summary: Interested but not urgent. 6-month timeline. Needs spousal approval. Vague on pricing. Wants more information.
call_analysis.next_steps: Send comp analysis and nurture sequence
